name: Tap Tap Me - A Simon Says game
name_original: Tap Tap Me - A Simon Says game
description:
This is an addictive mimic memory game! This plays like the classic Simon Says game.

Simply observe a sequence of blinking lights with musical tones, and repeat the sequence in the same order. The sequence gets longer with each turn; and faster as the game continues.
